description: This file defines API routes for managing teacher entities in a school management system using FastAPI. It includes CRUD operations such as listing, retrieving by ID, creating, updating, patching, and deleting teachers. The routes utilize dependency injection for database sessions and handle HTTP exceptions.

classes.name: CRUDBase
classes.description: A generic CRUD class for database operations, instantiated here for the Teacher model.

methods.name: list_teachers( db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db), skip: int = Query(0, ge=0, description="Number of records to skip"), limit: int = Query(100, ge=1, le=1000, description="Max records to return"), )
methods.description: Returns a paginated list of teachers.

methods.name: get_teacher( teacher_id: int = Path(..., ge=1, description="Teacher ID"), db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db), )
methods.description: Retrieves a teacher by its ID.

methods.name: update_teacher( teacher_id: int = Path(..., ge=1), payload: TeacherUpdate = None, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db), )
methods.description: Replaces all fields of a teacher.

methods.name: patch_teacher( teacher_id: int = Path(..., ge=1), payload: TeacherUpdate = None, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db), )
methods.description: Updates specific fields of a teacher.

methods.name: delete_teacher(teacher_id: int = Path(..., ge=1), db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db))

ctags.name: create_teacher
ctags.pattern: /^async def create_teacher(payload: TeacherCreate, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db)):$/

ctags.name: delete_teacher
ctags.pattern: /^async def delete_teacher(teacher_id: int = Path(..., ge=1), db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db)):$/
ctags.signature: (teacher_id: int = Path(..., ge=1), db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db))

ctags.name: get_teacher
ctags.signature: ( teacher_id: int = Path(..., ge=1, description="Teacher ID"), db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db), )

ctags.name: list_teachers
ctags.signature: ( db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db), skip: int = Query(0, ge=0, description="Number of records to skip"), limit: int = Query(100, ge=1, le=1000, description="Max records to return"), )

ctags.name: patch_teacher
ctags.signature: ( teacher_id: int = Path(..., ge=1), payload: TeacherUpdate = None, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db), )

ctags.name: update_teacher
ctags.signature: ( teacher_id: int = Path(..., ge=1), payload: TeacherUpdate = None, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db), )
